title: BingX Restores WLFI (World Liberty Financial) Pre-Market Trading
content: Dear Users, BingX decides to resume WLFI (World Liberty Financial) pre-market trading immediately, allowing users adequate time to prepare tokens for delivery. Please note: The specific timing for the subsequent token delivery will be announced at a later date. Please stay tuned for official updates. During this period, WLFI (World Liberty Financial) pre-market trading will continue as normal. You may proceed with trading based on your needs. If you have any questions about pre-market trading, feel free to reach out to our customer support anytime. We’re here to assist you. Thank you for your understanding and support. For more details, please refer to BingX Pre-Market Trading Introduction & FAQ Terms & Conditions: Participants are required to complete advanced identity verification to be eligible for Pre-Market Trading. All non-individual accounts, such as market makers and brokers, cannot participate in Pre-Market Trading. Any users involved in illegal or malicious activities, such as fraud, participating with multiple accounts, or reward farming, will be disqualified and have their rewards revoked. BingX reserves the right to the final interpretations of this event, including any modifications, updates to terms, or cancellations. BingX will assist users in handling issues related to Pre-Market Trading. For any questions, please reach out to our online support for assistance. The project information, launch plan, and more are provided by the project team. The platform will notify any changes made during the event in a separate announcement. Risk Warning: Cryptocurrencies are highly volatile and subject to various risks, including market, project, technical and compliance-related uncertainties. Therefore, you may experience potential investment losses due to high volatility and various risks associated. Exercise caution, stay informed on the potential risks and invest prudently.BingX remains committed to delivering an improved trading experience and services. Thank you for your continued support and understanding! BingX Operation Team 2025-08-25 BingX Official Channels BingX Web: https://bingx.com BingX Blog: https://blog.bingx.com Telegram:https://t.me/BingXOfficial X:https://x.com/BingXOfficial YouTube:https://www.youtube.com/c/bingx Risk Disclaimer Cryptocurrency prices are subject to high market risk and price volatility. You should only invest in products that you are familiar with and where you understand the associated risks. You should carefully consider your investment experience, financial situation, investment objectives and risk tolerance and consult an independent financial adviser prior to making any investment. This material is for reference only and should not be construed as financial advice. Past performance is not a reliable indicator of future performance. The value of your investment can go down as well as up, and you may not get back the amount you invested. You are solely responsible for your investment decisions. BingX is not responsible for any losses you may incur. BingX attaches great importance to compliance and has strictly abided by local regulations. Please obey local laws and regulations in your country or region. BingX reserves the right in its sole discretion to amend, change, or cancel this announcement at any time and for any reason without prior notice. For more information, please refer to the Terms of Use and Risk Warning.
